ygData.subject: RE: Forage and Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: On the brewers list, someone posted an extensive list of all the new foraged items.  Just about every zone has one.  What they can be used for (baking,
ygData.messageBody:
On the brewers list, someone posted an extensive list of all the new foraged
items. Just about every zone has one. What they can be used for (baking,
brewing, poisons) remains to be discovered.

Galtin of E'ci

> Everyone knows that Bard forage caps at 40 right? There is some concern
> floating about that a minimum skill of 100 in forage is required to get
> the
> new unique items people are finding in the different zones.
>
> I have a bit of good news, I foraged an "ash root" last night (I think it
> was in Kithcor) and later foraged a normal "root" in HighKeep. They were
> definitely separate items and did not stack with one another (much like
> the
> old berries and fruit that have been around and have the same graphic).
>
> Any other bards on this list found any of the unique new forage items yet
> too?
>
> BTW - my forage is maxed at the cap, 40.
>
> - Faras
> >
